title: Study Visa for New Zealand
overview: New Zealand offers globally recognized education, a safe environment, and modern campuses. With post-study work options and high academic standards, it’s ideal for students seeking quality learning and a balanced lifestyle. Experience innovation, cultural diversity, and excellent career opportunities in one of the world’s most welcoming and scenic destinations.
why_this_country_content: Opportunities for part-time work during studies
Post-study work visa and migration pathways
estimated_cost_title: Estimated Cost of Study in New Zealand

title: Study Visa for Australia
overview: Australia is known for top-ranked universities, modern facilities, and a multicultural environment. Students gain global exposure, flexible study options, and post-study work opportunities. With safe cities, great weather, and career-focused education, Australia is a leading destination for international students aiming for academic and professional excellence.
why_this_country_content: Post-study work rights for international graduates
Pathways to permanent migration for skilled graduates
estimated_cost_title: Estimated Cost of Study in Australia

title: Study Visa for USA
overview: The USA offers world-class universities, advanced research, and diverse programs. Students benefit from global exposure, scholarships, and career opportunities through OPT. With innovation-driven learning and vast networking prospects, studying in the USA helps students develop leadership, creativity, and academic excellence for a successful global career.
why_this_country_content: Top-ranked universities including Ivy League options
Diverse courses and flexible study programs
Access to scholarships and research funding
estimated_cost_title: Estimated Cost of Study in USA

title: Study Visa for United Kingdom (UK)
overview: The UK provides world-class education, globally valued degrees, and rich cultural exposure. With short, focused programs and post-study work options, it combines academic excellence with career growth. Students experience innovation, heritage, and a vibrant lifestyle while studying in one of the world’s most respected learning destinations.
why_this_country_content: World-renowned universities like Oxford and Cambridge
Graduate Route allows post-study work for 2 years
estimated_cost_title: Estimated Cost of Study in UK
estimated_cost_content: Health Insurance: Included in visa fee (IHS)
